about_the_game:
About the Game


Potato is a clicker game where you click on a Potato!

Get a random potato for every 3 hours you play the game and grow your collection! Share these potatoes with your friends and other community players.

Game Features:


Usually Potatoes!

Expand your collection by collecting all potatoes.

Achievements:


A community that's Potatoes
Design submission via Discord! Yes, that's right ! All our potatoes are made with community effort and inspiration, come join the fun!

Don't forget to unlock the chance to get a special potato and a unique achievement with the Crafting System
detailed_description:
About the Game


Potato is a clicker game where you click on a Potato!

Get a random potato for every 3 hours you play the game and grow your collection! Share these potatoes with your friends and other community players.

Game Features:


Usually Potatoes!

Expand your collection by collecting all potatoes.

Achievements:


A community that's Potatoes
Design submission via Discord! Yes, that's right ! All our potatoes are made with community effort and inspiration, come join the fun!

Don't forget to unlock the chance to get a special potato and a unique achievement with the Crafting System

short_description: Potato is a clicker game. There are dozens of different kinds of potatoes that you will get every time you click on the potato! You can expand your collection by collecting these potatoes. You can also trade them with your friends or other players in the community.
